rules_text:
Menace
[i]Vengeance's Boon[/i] – Whenever you attack, for each opponent you attacked this turn, put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. That creature gains menace until end of turn.
[i]Heartseeker[/i] – Spells you cast that target a creature cost {2} less to cast.
Partner with Selena, Bow Knight
